thread.title: itel it1518 with 5-inch HD display, selfie flash and VoLTE launched for Rs 7,550
thread.title_full: itel it1518 with 5-inch HD display, selfie flash and VoLTE launched for Rs 7,550

title: itel it1518 with 5-inch HD display, selfie flash and VoLTE launched for Rs 7,550
text:
itel it1518 with 5-inch HD display, selfie flash and VoLTE launched for... itel it1518 with 5-inch HD display, selfie flash and VoLTE launched for Rs 7,550 By January 25, 2017 “The it1518 is a budget offering with 4G, VoLTE, 8MP/5MP cameras and a 2,500mAh battery” 
Hong Kong-based itel Mobile launched the it1520 budget smartphone with an Iris scanner and VoLTE in India last year. Today, the company has expanded its range of Android phones in the country with the launch of the itel it1518. It is an entry-level offering with support for 4G and VoLTE (voice over LTE). 
The itel it1518 features a 5-inch HD Oncell display, and boots Android 6.0 Marshmallow. The phone is powered by a 1.3GHz quad-core MediaTek processor, mated to 2GB of RAM. The storage capacity on board is 8GB, which can be further increased up to 128GB by inserting a microSD card. It comes with an 8MP rear snapper and a 5MP selfie snapper, both accompanied by an LED flash. The device offers dual-  and GPS. A 2,500mAh battery keeps the whole package running. 
The itel it1518   7,550, and is being offered in black, white and champagne hues. The phone will be available across channels in the country soon. Facebook Comments
